name: Cisco | ASA | Security | Authentication | Logout (SYSLOG)
description: %ASA-6-315011: SSH session from 10.250.1.18 on interface management for user "" disconnected by SSH server, reason: "TCP connection closed" (0x03)

patterns.value_re: %(?:ASA|PIX)-6-315011: SSH session from (?P<ip>\S+) on interface management for user \"(?P<user>.*)\" disconnected by SSH server, reason: .+
